anya-e0105n18:1_1: mahisāsakavinayapiṭakañca dīghāgamo ca saṁyuttāgamo ca sannipātapiṭakañca attanā
anya-e0105n18:1_2: saha cinaraṭṭhamānītanti tassa addhānakkamakathāyaṁ dassitaṁ. Tañca sabbaṁ abhayagirivihāratoyeva
anya-e0105n18:1_4: ca tattheva bhaveyyuṁ, mahāvihāravāsīhi tesaṁ appaṭiggahitabhāvato. Tathā “phāhiyambhikkhussa
anya-e0105n18:1_5: sīhaḷadīpe paṭivasanakāle (954-956-bu-va) mahāvihāre tisahassamattā bhikkhū vasanti,
anya-e0105n18:1_6: te theravādapiṭakameva uggaṇhanti, na mahāyānapiṭakaṁ. Abhayagirivihāre pañcasahassamattā
anya-e0105n18:1_7: bhikkhū vasanti, te pana dvepi piṭakāni uggaṇhanti mahāyānapiṭakañceva theravādapiṭakañcā”ti
anya-e0105n18:2_0: Yasmā pana abhayagirivāsino mahāyānapiṭakampi uggaṇhanti, tasmā tasmiṁ vihāre mahāyānikānaṁ
anya-e0105n18:2_2: tatoyeva tesaṁ nayañca nāmañca ācariyabuddhaghosattheropi aññepi taṁkālikā mahāvihāravāsino
anya-e0105n18:2_3: sutasampannā therā jāneyyuṁyeva. Apica dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe samuddasamīpe guntājanapade
anya-e0105n18:2_4: nāgārajunakoṇḍaṁ nāma ṭhānamatthi, yattha nāgajjuno mahāyānikānaṁ padhānācariyabhūto
anya-e0105n18:2_5: vasanto buddhasāsanaṁ patiṭṭhāpesi. Ācariyabuddhaghosassa ca tandesikabhāvanimittaṁ
anya-e0105n18:2_6: dissati, taṁ pacchato (33-piṭṭhe) āvibhavissati. Tasmāpi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero
anya-e0105n18:2_7: nāgajjunassa ca assaghosassa ca nayañca nāmañca jāneyyayevāti sakkā anuminituṁ.
anya-e0105n18:3_0: Jānatoyeva pana tesaṁ nayassa vā nāmassa vā attano aṭṭhakathāyamappakāsanaṁ tesaṁ
anya-e0105n18:3_1: nikāyantarabhāvatoyevassa. Tathā hi tesaṁ assaghosanāgajjunānaṁ assaghoso(570-670-buddhavassabbhantare)
anya-e0105n18:3_2: theravādato bhinnesu ekādasasu gaṇesu sabbatthivādagaṇe pariyāpanno, nāgajjuno ca
anya-e0105n18:3_4: ca āditoyeva paṭṭhāya nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṁ attano piṭakaṁ atīva ādaraṁ
anya-e0105n18:3_5: katvā rakkhanti, ayañca ācariyabuddhaghoso tesamaññataro. Vuttañhi tassa ganthanigamanesu
anya-e0105n18:3_7: jānantoyeva attano ganthesu nikāyantarasamayehi asammissanatthaṁ nappakāsesī”ti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0105n18:4_0: Ettāvatā ca yāni “bodhimaṇḍasamīpamhi, jāto brāhmaṇamāṇavo”tiādinā vuttassa mahāvaṁsavacanassa
anya-e0105n18:4_2: tāni amūlakabhāvena anuvicāritāni. Tathāpi “ācariyabuddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe jāto”ti
anya-e0105n18:4_3: etaṁ pana atthaṁ sādhetuṁ daḷhakāraṇaṁ na dissateva ṭhapetvā taṁ mahāvaṁsavacanaṁ,
anya-e0105n18:4_4: yampi buddhaghosuppattiyaṁ vuttaṁ, tampi mahāvaṁsameva nissāya vuttavacanattā na
